title: Online Supermarket
description: A supermarket website, with routing and an advanced cart. Recently remade to be more responsive and reflect better code practices.

title: Blog
description: My first full-stack project, using the MERN stack. A simple blog. At this point I realized I knew very little about databases, APIs and routing, so this was a way to familiarize myself. Creating a post requires authorization, demo credentials are in the github repo linked below.

title: Trivia
description: My first React project, a Trivia single page app using the Open Trivia Database.
